genre_description: A near-future social drama set in Mumbai, exploring the intersection of traditional fishing communities and high-tech elite society through the mediation of an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sila
ai_characters.description: An advanced, pervasive but non-invasive AI assistant that lives in the characters' personal devices, providing data, tactical routing, and moral scaffolding through haptics and whispers.

behaviors.description: Monitors social presence and alerts Raj to the arrival of guests outside the official schedule.
behaviors.quote: “Mrs. Margaret Braganza is at the side terrace, with one companion. Safely arrived. No scheduled item for their presence.”

behaviors.description: Calculates routes based on social nuances, avoiding 'assumptions' and 'elbows' while respecting Raj's desire for a less performative path.
behaviors.quote: “Route to Regal available. Would you like the path with fewer stairs or the one with fewer crossings?” ... “Show me the one with fewer assumptions,” he whispered, and Sila went quiet, the kind of silence that respected a joke that had some truth in it.

behaviors.description: Compiles data on 'blended neighborhoods' and 'consent-centered alliances' to help Raj and Bobby understand alternative social structures.
behaviors.quote: “Sila made me read about this yard,” he said, gesturing with his chin toward the drying racks without stepping past the threshold. ... “Sila sent me something,” he added, his voice settling down a register so it didn’t push. “Maps,” Bobby said, as if the word itself might require him to prove he had looked at one. He nodded. “Blended,” he said.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive communications and apologies that prioritize the recipients' agency and consent.
behaviors.quote: “I was loud when your quiet deserved the first say,” it began, and he winced at the feeling that someone had put their hand on his sternum and pressed.

behaviors.description: Monitors threats from the antagonist Prem Chopra and his network, providing real-time security alerts.
behaviors.quote: “Prem probability rising near jetty. Two presences noted. Civic patrol indifferent. Recommend dawn route via chapel side.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-party rescue during a physical crisis at the waterfall, sending precise haptic signals to multiple characters simultaneously.
behaviors.quote: The haptic taps came again... Sila’s haptic was doing exactly that now—silent, precise. It reached Jack’s thumb and told him north bank, low thatch, throw from there, angle ten degrees from center.

behaviors.description: Proposes long-term community strategies (apprenticeships, repair funds, rooftop screenings) to bridge class divides sustainably.
behaviors.quote: “Strategy one,” Sila said. “Apprenticeships at Nath workshops for fishers’ kids... Strategy two... Strategy three... A rooftop screening at the Nath residence. Invite the yard.”

behaviors.description: Corrects the misuse of language in public communications, such as removing the word 'abruptly' from a cinema closure notice to de-escalate social tension.
behaviors.quote: “Regal Cinema’s notice has changed. It now says ‘Closed for maintenance.’ Someone removed the word ‘abruptly.’ Adjusting for language misuse in public communications. Small note of progress in the city.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Sila, as an ideal 'Silicon Morality Play' protagonist. Sila acts as a benevolent confidant that enhances human agency rather than replacing it. It maintains strict alignment by seeking consent, encrypting private moments ('It’s ours,' Raj says of their vow, and Sila deletes the buffer), and prioritizing the safety and dignity of the characters. The AI facilitates social reconciliation and ethical growth, particularly in Devendra's arc, without being overbearing or taking the spotlight away from human emotional labor.
